content: create your own adorable little angel with this crochet pattern perfect for hanging on your christmas tree or giving as a heartfelt gift this easy-level pattern includes detailed instructions to guide you through each step making it suitable for beginners and experienced crocheters alike the finished angel measures 3 5 inches tall and has a wingspan of 3 0 inches using red heart super saver yarn in aran weight this pattern is a fun and quick project to add a touch of handmade charm to your holiday decor **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for beginners detailed written instructions for each step adorable design perfect for holiday decorations uses readily available red heart super saver yarn **materials needed-** yarn red heart super saver solids in aran weight 100-125 yards stitch marker fiberfill stuffing hooks 2 25mm us size 1 0 4mm us size 6 0 **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of
